nodes.text: K3-F7 was an astromech droid that served the reconstituted Sith Empire aboard Vaiken Spacedock during the Galactic War with the Galactic Republic.

K3-F7 appears in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Rise of the Hutt Cartel as the Imperial Flashpoint courier for the Korriban Incursion Flashpoint, though he is only found aboard Vaiken Spacedock and not on other planets like other couriers.
